values: it seems like everything is coming down crashing on me.today my dad threatened to call the cops on me and i know its my fault because im the one who charged the money to the account and i know i wasnt supposed to do it.i feel like everything aroun me is a blur and i cant control any of it and i just seriously wish that it would all end and that i would end up dead or something.i know im a smart and intelligent i just make most of the wrong decisions and i dont know what keeps me from going with the right choice to begin with and im also so sick of being taken advantage.it feels like from the start my whole life has seemed to be one big joke to alot of people and i just wish for once that someone would take me seriously and i know the one person who would take me seriously and the thing is i just seem to keep pushing him away when i know deep down that hes the right person for me i just have a hard timeletting him in because i know that hes the right person but he also understands me on a different level and i just am so afraid that hes going to pull the same crap that everyone else in this world has done to me.he makes me smile so much and i just wish i had the gut to really tell him what would be in my heart if i really knew how to express myself,but it seems to me like my head interferes with my heart too much and i let my head take control of the situation usually and
http://moonshine06.livejournal.com/13225.html

so its been like over a year since ive last written here.so much has happened since then.there was me changing my major from early childhood to cosmetology.i figured since i already have two little boys who are pretty much my own,that was a fair enough dose of little kids for me.i started school in march and it was an interesting start.during that timeframe,mike broke his leg at the end of may,and we broke up in june.well so i thought.we kept hooking up and talking and everything so we decided to give it another shot.didnt work so we broke up a week later,and thought that was the complete end of it.during that breakup i dated some guy in texas over the internet for a week named matt.he was nice and all but it just felt like a huge part of me was missing.so i broke up with matt,and slowly started talking to mike again.i also got into a huge spat with his mom back in june,which didnt make things at all easy for me.we've been back together since like july/august and we couldn't be any happier,despite the fact that his mom and grandparents dont know that we're dating.i will be moving in with him in a few months,hes in school and was/is working and making money.but im happy in that department.since ive last posted,i weighed in at 260 pounds.since then ive lost about 40 and am down to 228.30 of it ive lost by myself.and the other 12 so far ive lost doing weightwatchers,and its going really well.school is a dramafest and i dont need it.thats pretty much it for now.
http://moonshine06.livejournal.com/13011.html

so lately i havent been having too much fun at my house.i get ridiculed for everything that happens and blamed for everything that i didnt even do. so thats why i have decided to move out and start my life. at the moment im looking for a job so that i will be able to afford my own apartment,around may michael will be moving in to help me with rent so that we can both get our life together started.shortly after i will be starting school in the fall for early childhood development in hopes of getting a degree in childcare so i can work with little kids,it would be the perfect career for me because im really good with children.my mom will most likely be helping me out a little bit when i first move in,the only problem is i dont know how im going to get my car away from my dad,considering i need it to get from point a to point b. kristen said she will teach me how to shop right and help me set myself up with housewares and such.good luck to me!!

cant control my depression for much longer.its starting to get outta control and its hurting people who i care about.i wish bad shit like this wouldnt happen to me i cant seem to stop it. it hurts me that earlier i was told i dont know what love is..and it killed me. suicidal thoughts just seem to keep swarming around in my head and they wont leave it..its like they're permanently stuck in my head..3 years ago this week is when i met shain,and its come back to haunt me..im not going to be normal for the rest of this week. im ashamed to show my bisexual side because all it feels like is that im being judged...and i dont want that. i just need to be left alone and i wish people would stop worrying about me so much,if i do something thats going to make me feel better then let me do it,no matter if it hurts me or not i just want this pain to go away forever,but i dont think its going to.

today was by far the worst day of my life. now i know what its like to almost lose the most important person in my entire life. im so scared that we're going to just completely dump each other or something.yes now im admitting that i am OBSESSED with him,but thats kind of what happens when you're in love. knowing that you cant live without that person,but also knowing that at any moment it can just be snatched from right in front of me. this is my last chance,and i desperately need to change because i dont know how life would be without him but im seriously not ready to find out.i know that i want to spend the rest of my days with him,no matter what anyone else says.we're made for each other,i can feel it.but i AM going to change,i need to otherwise my life is over.

yesterday started off with me going to get gas at 730 in the morning.then i came home and went on the computer.then around 9 i get a call from mike to see if i wanted to come over and go swimming,so obviously im going to be like "hells yah",so i went over and we went swimming,unfortunately his little sister was in the pool bugging us and everything but it kinda made it more fun considering we were throwing the ball at her heh.then mike decides to take a noodle and put it up against the pool jet attempting to spray me,so i had to force it out of his hands hah.after we went swimming which we ended up being done around 1130ish, then i went back to my house to take a shower and get ready to go back over his house. so i got back over to his house and we left for the fair around 1230ish.when we got there,there was seriously nothing to do and we were both bored outta our minds.so we walked around until like 130 because we were hot and bored and we wanted to go swimming again.so we had to wait til 2 to go back to his house.ran into alycia while i was there,so i stayed and chatted for awhile while he browsed for things that caught his eye.he ended up buying me a new purse:).its really convenient considering i practically carry my life with me. so we got back to his house and went swimming for awhile, until his cousins showed up,then we were done,so we sat on the swing until it was time to go.on the way back to the fair,we stopped and got smoothies from DD,mmmm yummy:).got back to the fair and wandered around some more.i guess we caught marys eye because she called us over and told us to chill for awhile,so im sitting there like ok sure since theres not to much else to do.so we were sitting there talking with her for a bit, but about after an hour or so she starts bitching at mike for not taking me to prom when i already talked to him about it,so we were all fine.but no,mary had to friggin carry on.then ashley showed up and chilled for awhile but then she had to get going.so we were off being bored once again, but he played games and won me a teddy bear and a white valentines lion hehe.soo cute i love them both:). the night ended up with us cuddling on the grass watching the fireworks.the dream of me being with a person i cared about more than anything watching the fireworks all cuddled up and just sitting there in each others arms and getting kissed during the fireworks finally came true...since i didnt get a chance to watch them with him on the fourth, but he made it up to me. :) then we got to hang out for a bit today too before he went home.so it was well worth the wait for him to be up here.i got to see him for 13 hours yesterday and for around 3 today,my life is awesome:)

ok things have been so screwed up lately.one minute me and my parents are fighting with each other,the next minute we're getting along.its wicked wierd.i think i have to go job hunting today which isnt going to be fun,but it has to be done,then i have to go to the blood drive to donate....woohoo,my mom gave me this whole"theyre desperate"talk which made me feel guilty so therefore im donating.then yesterday i went to my friend rae's party, which was ok,but it coulda been better.then i had to drive her home and she left her dogfood in my car,which i didnt get a chance to give it back to her because i was out the whole day and my parents wanted me home.then michael called the house and asked for me,which was shocking because im pretty sure that he was supposed to be grounded,unless he got off it a day early or something.needless to say,we're going to funfest next weekend:).it was ok last year,he took me when i first moved here,and it was kinda fun considering that i didnt know anybody,that was on our 1 month anniversary..wow that seems like it was such a long time ago.now its been over a year and we're still together,needless to say we dont count that break when we actually did break up because those 3 days i pretended to be happy but i really wasnt.but i just thank god that we're back together,i wouldnt have made it this far if it werent for him.i love you sweetheart!!<3

this is just getting way out of hand.im sick of feeling like a part time gf to him and i want it to stop.i want a REAL RELATIONSHIP with him,one where we're not being watched all the time,or limited to the amount of time we get to see each other for.example,last saturday we went to the movies,i thought i was going over his house for a little bit after,but no i get dropped off at my house,i went over at 12 and came home at 3:15.big fuckin deal,its not like i get to see him whenever i want.then he chooses his job over me??he says its so he can take me to the movies whenever,well what if i dont want that?!what if i am just happy spending time with you in private where we're not even saying anything to each other,with your arms around me and you just look at me every 5 mins just to see what my face looks like,and you tell me you love me and that im beautiful and that you enjoy just being there.i just want your mother and your grandparents to please just stay out of our relationship and just let us have one.because i am just so SICK of having your "parents" telling you how much time we get to spend together.you're not a child,you're perfectly capable of taking care of yourself.what about when we get married???are they going to tell you that you cant do this or that in our marriage,or that we cant get married at all??i mean you need to stand up to them and tell them to mind their own business and to just stay out of it.i mean i love you and everything and im not planning on breaking up with you again,that was the worst mistake i made in my life.its just that i dont want to be crying myself to sleep because i miss you so much.you have never done anything to hurt me..and i thank you for that so much.i just want to spend some real time together like we did last summer...remember that day when we first started going out we spent like 9 hours together,it was amazing.but now its down to like 3 or 4 if im lucky to get to spend that much time with you.ITS NOT FAIR TO ME OR YOU to do that to each other.and the thing is,neither your grandparents or your mom even seem to CARE.thats pretty pathetic.when you find someone,your parents are supposed to let you spend time together,because if they knew what love is, they would let us see each other as much as we wanted to.but i guess thats asking too much.i just wanted to tell everyone..dont ever let your parents try to ruin a relationship,because if that person means as much to you as you say or think they do,you would try to spend the most time with them as much as humanly possible.but the fact that his grandparents are making him slave away at work doesnt help at all.i miss you mike
